Author: somegaijin42

Comment: There are many things happening in the world for which we cannot be certain of the outcome. This isn’t one of those. When we exist in a global economy and the president suddenly tariffs everyone under the sun en masse, it is 100% certain to upset our allies and make everything more expensive. Anyone not living under a rock is painfully aware of this every time they reach the cash register and when they read international news articles.  In the eyes of voters, Trump’s single greatest quality was that he was going to “fix the economy” and help make life more affordable. Even immigration was a distant second issue by comparison. So, when the majority of voters show up at the ballot box for the midterm elections, do you really think the majority are going to say “yea, I want more of that”?  Seriously, this is why people accuse Trump’s base of being cult like. And, no. Despite voting for Trump all three times, I don’t consider myself his base.
Author: CamoAnimal
